name: Luna
bio: Meet the newest addition to PetPal Adoption Center – a charming and unnamed furry friend awaiting your love and care. name: Polly
bio: Meet Polly, the colorful and charismatic parrot ready to brighten up your virtual world! Polly is a playful and talkative companion, always eager to learn new phrases and share a laugh.
